15#ifndef DNS_OPCODE_H
16#define DNS_OPCODE_H 1
17
18/*! \file dns/opcode.h */
19
20#include <isc/lang.h>
21
22#include <dns/types.h>
23
24ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
25
26isc_result_t dns_opcode_totext(dns_opcode_t opcode, isc_buffer_t *target);
27/*%<
28 * Put a textual representation of error 'opcode' into 'target'.
29 *
30 * Requires:
31 *\li 'opcode' is a valid opcode.
32 *
33 *\li 'target' is a valid text buffer.
34 *
35 * Ensures:
36 *\li If the result is success:
37 * The used space in 'target' is updated.
38 *
39 * Returns:
40 *\li #ISC_R_SUCCESS on success
41 *\li #ISC_R_NOSPACE target buffer is too small
42 */
43
44ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
45
46#endif /* DNS_OPCODE_H */
47
